select email from house_product where product_id = #{productId}
select p.*, d.*, b.comp_name from house_product p join house_detail d on p.product_id = d.product_id join business b on p.email = b.email where p.product_id = #{productId}

mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(product_id),0) +1 FROM house_product
insert into house_product( product_id, email, main_img, house_name, sale_type, price, sigungu, house_type, floor, area_exclusive, room_cnt, detail_contents ) values(#{productId}, #{email}, #{mainImg}, #{houseName}, #{saleType}, #{price}, #{sigungu}, #{houseType}, #{floor}, #{areaExclusive}, #{roomCnt}, #{detailContents} )

insert into house_detail( detail_id, product_id, bath_cnt, parking, house_face, construction_year, tags, street_address ) values( (SELECT NVL(MAX(product_id),0) +1 FROM house_detail), (SELECT NVL(MAX(product_id),0) +1 FROM house_detail), #{bathCnt}, #{parking}, #{houseFace}, #{constructionYear}, #{tags}, #{streetAddress} )
mapper.update: update house_product set product_state = #{productState}, main_img = #{mainImg}, house_name = #{houseName}, sale_type = #{saleType}, price = #{price}, sigungu = #{sigungu}, house_type = #{houseType}, floor = #{floor}, area_exclusive = #{areaExclusive}, room_cnt = #{roomCnt}, detail_contents = #{detailContents} where product_id = #{productId}

update house_detail set street_address = #{streetAddress}, house_face = #{houseFace}, parking = #{parking}, bath_cnt = #{bathCnt}, construction_year = #{constructionYear}, tags = #{tags} where product_id = #{productId}

update business set comp_name = #{compName}, comp_intro = #{compIntro}, comp_address = #{compAddress}, profile_pic = #{profilePic}, phone = #{phone}, business_img = #{businessImg}, broker_img = #{brokerImg}, business_id = #{businessId}, broker_id = #{brokerId} where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select * from house_product where sigungu like #{sigungu} and sale_type = '아파트'
select * from bookmark b join house_product h on b.service_id = h.product_id where b.service_type = 0 and b.email = #{email}
